name: netlify-shortener
description: Uses netlify's redirect functionality to make a personal URL shortener. Works beautifully :)

scripts.set-upstream: git remote add upstream https://github.com/shorter/netlify-shortener.git && git fetch upstream
scripts.update: git fetch upstream && git rebase upstream/master

author: Kent C. Dodds <kent@doddsfamily.us> (http://kentcdodds.com/)
